name: Neon Pagoda Blocks
description:
Build a pagoda tower in a dystopian future.

This is our first Godot game at Aprikot Games. Created as a submission for Mini Jam 63: Future.

Github repository: https://github.com/Aprikot-Games/MiniJam63

Inspired by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3918-inspired
